mapper.insert: insert into order_user ( id, name, pwd, phone, money ) values( null, #{name}, #{pwd}, #{phone}, #{money} );
mapper.select: select id as user_id, name as user_name, pwd as user_pwd, phone as user_phone from order_user where name=#{name};
select store_id as store_id, store_name as store_name, store_url as store_url from store;
